metadata.title: CVE-2021-47201 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:iavf: free q_vectors before queues in iavf_disable_vfiavf_free_queues() clears adapter->num_active_queues, whichiavf_free_q_vectors() relies on, so swap the order of these two functioncalls in iavf_disable_vf(). This resolves a panic encountered when theinterface is disabled and then later brought up again after PFcommunication is restored.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
